node.display_long_description:
Let‚Äôs dive in and explore the world of fishing or just sit back and relax in a mesmerizing scenery together.
Real VR Fishing invites you to the incredible real-world fishing spots to feel the taste of fishing in the Multiplayer mode or to relax and enjoy the stillness in the Single-play mode. 

MULTIPLAYER CO-OP AVAILABLE UP TO 4 USERS
Change your avatar, put on new clothes. Join friends, or meet new people to relax, talk, and go fishing together!

REALISTIC FISHING EXPERIENCE
Different difficulties for anglers and non-anglers. Turn off UI display for the most realistic experience when you are ready for a real challenge!

YOUTUBE & WEB-BROWSING
Need a break from fishing? Lie down and bring up the screen to relax and enjoy or turn up the volume and listen to the music while fishing!

YOUR AQUARIUM
Want to keep admiring the fish you have reeled in? Customize your aquarium by filling it with your catch, and purchase unique decorations from the shop!

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
1. The issue of the local state of aquarium decorations changed to that of the host's after the multiplayer session has been fixed.
2. The issue of the media player tabs not showing when playing left single-hand mode has been fixed.
3. Corrected a typo in the fish name "SHINER."

nodes.title: ‚ÄúHoliday Edition‚Äù is now live with the ‚ÄúHoliday Season Event‚Äù!
nodes.body_text:
Holiday Edition Update
A new free update for our fans is now available. Adding over 30 new Epic species, boats, customizable items, and many QoL improvements for you to better enjoy your holiday. Are you ready for the new challenges?

Holiday Pack
Missed our previous celebration packs? Want that new boat in the ‚ÄúHoliday Edition‚Äù update? We‚Äôve got you covered. Log in now to get the ‚ÄúHoliday Package,‚Äù including ‚Äú1st-year anniversary pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúHalloween pack,‚Äù ‚ÄúHoliday pack,‚Äù a newly updated freshwater motorboat, and 10K credits. You will be able to claim your package from the 17th of December ‚Äò20 00:00 AM until the 7th of January ‚Äò21, 11:59 PM (PT).

Boost Event
Having a hard time leveling up or buying new gears? Get ready to open up new stages and give your tackles a boost. Earn double ‚ÄúCredits and Experience Point‚Äù in Multiplayer sessions throughout Real VR fishing from the 24th of December ‚Äò20 00:00 AM until the 7th of January ‚Äò21, 11:59 PM (PT).

Fire up your Oculus Quest and reel those new Epic Fish.
Happy Fishing! ü•≥üòçüé£

node.reviewDescription:
This is my very first review for any game after 4 years of playing VR.

I will start off saying I do enjoy fishing but it hasn‚Äôt been a common pastime or hobby for me in awhile. I picked this game up on the Black Friday sale and it‚Äôs blown me away. The graphics and sound are incredible (as others have mentioned)! You are placed in an almost google earth looking type view of scenery with varying weather and time setting (including things like spontaneous fireworks, active weather, and other little bonuses). 

The fish are incredibly realistic looking and the actual fishing provides some challenge for those looking for it. I love sipping my drink, enjoying the ambiance, and reeling in some fish. I‚Äôve already almost reached max level but what keeps me coming back is the tranquility of the game and being able to play with friends! 

I‚Äôve made fishing and listening to lo-fi music (there is an in game browser you can watch things or play music through) with my buddy an almost nightly occurrence. Heck, we don‚Äôt even fish the whole time while instead enjoying chatting in all the serene views or hanging out in the lodge. 

You can really tell the devs put in a ton of work into this game and it honestly puts me into another level of immersion. I‚Äôd love to see more locations (20 spots in Beautiful Korea included) and maybe the ability to fish in any direction 360 if you‚Äôre on a boat. But even without that this game is 5 stars. Whether you like fishing or not there‚Äôs so much joy to be had with this game I highly recommend it.

developerResponse.body: Thank you keekstur for enjoying Real VR Fishing. It is absolutely our honor to receive such great feedback and hear that you like the experience and the immersion from the game. Our team has indeed brought in lots of effort to create the immersive environment in the game. We will be adding more locations as DLC; however, it's getting delayed due to COVID-19. Instead, we are going to have more fish species and items for the coming update. And also our team will see if the 360 direction fishing is feasible for a future update. Thank you for your support and happy fishing.
